common.description: Integrated solutions in Glovia® ERP, custom development, and high-performance infrastructure to drive your business forward.
common.motto: We turn technological challenges into competitive advantages.

services.upgrades_description: Our Installation and Upgrade service ensures your system stays current. With this service, your business can maintain access to the latest software version, complete with all available features and security updates.
services.glovia_description: Glovia® ERP is a comprehensive, integrated enterprise management system that provides solutions across all areas of your business. With this system, you can optimize processes, reduce costs, and increase team productivity.
services.integration_description: Our ERP Integration service enables you to connect different company systems to improve internal efficiency and communication. This integration allows you to automate processes, reduce errors and redundant work, and enhance decision-making.
services.webdesign_description: Create a modern, responsive website for your business with our web design service. This service helps improve user experience, increase brand visibility, and generate more leads and sales for your business.
services.infrastructure_description: Have a high-performance infrastructure to support your business growth. Our Infrastructure service ensures your company has the necessary resources to handle increased demand and business expansion.
services.support_description: Count on specialized technical support to resolve issues and maintain system stability. Our Technical Support service ensures your company has the necessary support to keep your system running efficiently and securely.

about_us.header_description: At CSN Technology, we combine technical expertise with strategic vision to drive digital transformation for businesses. With over a decade of experience, we deliver customized ERP solutions that optimize operations and generate tangible results.
about_us.excellence_description: Streamlined processes through integrated ERP solutions
about_us.partnership_description: Long-term relationships built on measurable results
about_us.innovation_description: Technology roadmap aligned with global trends
about_us.cta_description: Our team is here to tackle your challenges and deliver tailored tech solutions.
about_us.mission_text: At CSN Consulting in Technology, our mission is to provide integrated technological solutions that drive the digital transformation of our clients, adding value and contributing to the sustainable growth of their businesses.
about_us.vision_text: To be the most trusted and innovative technology consulting firm in the industry, recognized for our ability to anticipate trends and create solutions that empower our clients to stand out in an ever-evolving market.
about_us.values_text: We foster creativity and the pursuit of new technologies and approaches to solve problems effectively.
about_us.commitment_text: We are dedicated to understanding and meeting the unique needs of each client, prioritizing their satisfaction and success.
about_us.ethics_text: We act with integrity, building relationships based on trust and honesty.
about_us.collaboration_text: We value teamwork, believing that effective partnerships lead to more robust solutions and superior results.
about_us.excellence_text: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from delivering our services to building relationships with our clients and collaborators.

not_found.header_description_1: We are working to bring you an even better experience.
not_found.header_description_2: Soon, this page will be available with all the necessary information.
not_found.return_title: In the meantime, you can return to the homepage.
not_found.return_cta: Click here to go back to the homepage.

descriptions.gerenciamento_de_produtos: Complete control of product lifecycle, from registration to inventory tracking and technical specifications
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_clientes: Centralized customer data, purchase history and interactions for personalized relationships
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_fornecedores: Strategic management of business partners with performance evaluation and purchase process control
descriptions.business_intelligence: Real-time data analysis with interactive dashboards and reports for strategic decision making
descriptions.cadeia_de_suprimentos: Integrated logistics optimization with demand management, distribution planning and inventory control
descriptions.manufatura: Production process control with resource management, production orders and quality assurance
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_servicos: Organization of contracts, SLAs and technical support for post-sales service excellence
descriptions.gerenciamento_de_projetos: Project planning and monitoring with resource allocation, schedules and performance indicators
descriptions.financeiro: Integrated management of accounts, cash flow, collections and compliance with fiscal accounting standards
